name: star_added
desc: A member has starred an item.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A member has starred an item  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							 When an item is starred, the star_added event is sent to all connected clients for the authenticated user who starred the item. See the stars.list method for details of the structure of the item property.
